contentBlocks.value: This beer is pretty dank but also kinda sweet. I drank one at 3 quarter time while playing in a footy scratch match. I marked the ball in the goal square and to kick the winning goal at full time, managed to kick it out on the full. Strong percentage beers will do that to ya, at 8.8% that's not to bad, but the can i had came in at whopping 500ml. Not Bad, just keep it one ice till after the game.
